text: Fine, Call It a Comeback  —  If the Joe Biden who showed up to deliver the State of the Union address last week is the Joe Biden who shows up for the rest of the campaign, you're not going to have any more of those weak-kneed pundits suggesting he's not up to running for re-election.  Here's hoping he does.

Biden team brings in $10 million in the 24 hours after the State of the Union  —  First to NBC News: The financial haul dwarfs some of the president's biggest fundraising days in 2023, before his rematch with Donald Trump was set.  —  President Joe Biden's re-election machine brought …

Biden breaks with Netanyahu but sticks with Israel … But in many ways, Biden sees Netanyahu as the one responsible for the deal slipping away. … - Biden has given the Israeli government unprecedented support over the past five months, at the cost of strong pushback from the president's party during an election year.

Biden hits out at Trump in Georgia rally: 'He's been sucking up to dictators all over the world'  —  Biden took the State of the Union to the battleground state that was critical to his 2020 win ahead of Tuesday's primary  —  The question isn't whether Democrats in Georgia will vote for President Joe Biden …

Status Report: The Katie Britt Lie  —  Fallout from the Alabama senator's intentionally and highly misleading story continues.  —  By now you've probably heard the news: Sen. Katie Britt's rebuttal to President Joe Biden's State of the Union was not just a painfully bad theatrical performance …

Republicans are ‘moving the process of appropriations forward’: Katie Britt  —  Sen. Katie Britt, R-Ala., joins ‘Fox News Sunday,’ to discuss foreign aid appropriations, criticism linking a human trafficking case to President Biden, and IFV access in her state.

$91M Bond Didn't Stop Trump From Trashing E. Jean Carroll Again  —  Donald Trump just had to post a $91.6 million bond while he appeals the verdict in the defamation case won by his rape accuser, E. Jean Carroll.  But that whopping sum wasn't enough to get him to stop trashing her.

Despite being found liable for attack, Trump claims E. Jean Carroll made ‘false accusations’ against him  —  The former president is appealing two civil court losses after he was found liable for sexually abusing and then defaming the writer.  —  ROME, Georgia — Former President Donald Trump …

Major US corporations threaten to return labor to ‘law of the jungle’  —  Trader Joe's and SpaceX are among businesses challenging the constitutionality of the National Labor Relations Board  —  Upset by the surge in union drives, several of the best-known corporations in the US are seeking …

Kari Lake Tries a New Tactic: Mending Fences  —  The close Trump ally is courting former foes and trying to mend fences as she runs for Senate in Arizona.  But bad blood from her 2022 campaign simmers at home.  —  Conciliatory messages on social media.  Open invitations for coffee.

Johnson, Scott hit Biden over walking back ‘illegal’ remark: ‘The president is cowering to his base’  —  Speaker Mike Johnson (R-La.) and other Republicans went after President Biden on Sunday for walking back remarks he made during his State of the Union address, calling a man accused of murder an “illegal.”

Scoop: Trump's team hires lawyer to “watch the money” at RNC … - Trump campaign co-campaign manager and incoming RNC chief operating officer Chris LaCivita is bringing on Sean Cairncross to be his number two at the RNC.  — Cairncross is a lawyer with a reputation of enforcing financial discipline …

After Trump ballot ruling, critics say Supreme Court is selectively invoking conservative originalist approach  —  Some legal scholars criticized the court for ignoring arguments based on the text and original understanding of Section 3 of the 14th Amendment in a ruling that kept Trump on the ballot.

600 Activision QA workers just formed the biggest videogame union in the US  —  Quality assured.  —  First reported by The Verge, 600 Activision QA workers have formed a new union at the publisher.  It was organized through the Communications Workers of America (CWA), like other unions at the company …
